bug.author: scarlett2018
bug.description: When login as core on INT bed, hit this error: <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/39592018/57900644-3e772780-7894-11e9-9f48-9dbda1b83522.png></denchmark-link>

comments.comment:
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/sunqinzheng>@sunqinzheng</denchmark-link> This issue hasn't been fixed completely. Here's a way to reproduce (provided by <denchmark-link:https://github.com/fanyangCS>@fanyangCS</denchmark-link> ):
open webportal in a laptop and login sleep the laptop for several hours open the laptop again and use webportal
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/sunqinzheng>@sunqinzheng</denchmark-link> , this happens when I submit a job selected from the marketplace.
It's a cookie expiration bug, fixed in <denchmark-link:https://github.com/microsoft/pai/pull/2843>#2843</denchmark-link> .
